Welcome to MAIT Project OOP’s documentation!

You find yourselves in the app for Data Analytics Dashboard developed by the students of MAIT 21/22 program of TH Köln.

It allows you to:

  • Upload your own datasets

  • Rename and drop columns within them

  • Smooth, filter and interpolate

  • Perform advanced machine learning with customizable parameters on you data

  • Visualize and download the results

You can find a deployed version of this app here.

  • Classification
    • KNN-,SVM- and LR-Classification Class
    • Neural Network Classification Class
    • Random Forest Classification Class
  • Regression

    • Neural Network Regression Class
    • Random Forest Regression Class
    • Time Series Neural Network Regression Class
    • Time Series Random Forest Regression Class
